meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>inferiority</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to be inferior to</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: When thinking about cars, an <reading>auto</reading>matic (おと) car is inferior to a manual car. Sure, manual is harder, but way more interesting to drive.
